front.div:
This invention offers a kind of data card and wireless communication system, the
5 stated data card includes: Wireless communication unit, are used for carrying on
demodulation and decoding to the data of Internet that are received according to the
internet protocol, get the base data; Agreement controlate unit, use for, go on 1394
agreements capsulate stated base data according to 1394 agreement, get 1394
agreement data package; 1394 interface units, are used for sending stated 1394
10 agreement data package to the subscriber station. The data card of embodiment of this
invention has been adopted 1394 interface, adopt the low problem of output current
that other interface cause after solving the Off-The-Shelf data card, having raised
transmission rate and access quantity of the data card, and the characteristic based on
point-to-point communication, can direct communication needn't the participation of
15 the third party between the apparatus.
A kind of data card and wireless communication system
Technical field
This invention involves the technical field of the wireless data terminal, especially
20 involve a kind of data card and wireless communication system.
Background technology
